t_scene_info.dialogue: Now I can dance like I could never before with this hairstyle.
Such a good girl I am now, I could win fashion awards.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: But I don't like the new hairstyle I have.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Ahh, the shrine maiden of the Hakurei Shrine. You aren't sharing your enthusiasm for this hairstyle.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Listen up. This is an order.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I think you want my mother to turn off this spell.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: From what I've heard in the wilderness, I've had no success with finding anyone who can help me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Perhaps your mother's the one I'm looking for...

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: She will be a lie. You can't ask her to end the spell.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Well, this is an order from the Chief Priestess of the Hakurei Shrine, being me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Reimu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I want to speak to your mother about a solution to this problem.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I fear that you'll end up finding the impossible. Trying to defeat me won't result in any luck.
